models

class models.RoleEnum(value)[source]

Bases: Enum

Enumeration representing user roles.

Values: - CLIENT: Regular client user. - MOD: Moderator user. - ADMIN: Administrator user.

ADMIN = 'ADMIN'
CLIENT = 'CLIENT'
MOD = 'MOD'
class models.User(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]

Bases: Model

User model representing registered users.

Parameters:

  • id (str) – The user’s unique identifier (UUID).

  • username (str) – The username chosen by the user.

  • password (str) – The hashed password for the user.

  • role (RoleEnum) – The role of the user (CLIENT, MOD, ADMIN).

class models.UserArticle(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]

Bases: Model

UserArticle model representing the relationship between users and favorited articles.

Parameters:

  • user_id (str) – The user’s unique identifier (UUID).

  • article_id (str) – The article’s unique identifier.

models.get_uuid()[source]

Generate a random UUID and return its hexadecimal representation.

Returns:

Hexadecimal representation of the generated UUID.

Return type:

str
